"Attention, all under the Chosen Ones and I, we are running an attack on th=
e Alliance base! Let's go!" Shokaract says. He drives toward the Alliance b=
ase, the Mafia following him.

"This just may be our chance." Deemos says. =
He goes with Shokaract. His followers (except Sharpedge, he's not mine) fol=
low Deemos. Deemos comes up to Shokaract. He decides not to bring up any ta=
lking, he remembered that he got nothing but a threat from Extractor. Airbo=
mber and Time Warp follow him.

"Remember, Infectra, we don't have to go." =
Airbomber whispered to her...
